full_summary:
### Raman Spectroscopy System

#### Reference Information
* Call for Tenders Title: Raman Spectroscopy System
* Solicitation Number: WS3631516918
* Publication Date: August 25, 2022
* Date and Time of Closing: October 12, 2022, at 14:00 EDT

#### Status and Procurement Details
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)
* Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Method of Acquisition: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Criteria for Election: Lowest Price

#### Notice Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) released a tender for the supply, delivery, installation and training of a Raman Spectroscopy System. The system consists of a spectrometer, 785nm laser source, fiber optic probe, software, sample holders, and calibration standard. The system is intended for use by the Department of National Defence at the Royal Military College Kingston.

#### Bidder and Supplier Instructions
All documents required for submission and bid must reach the PSPC by October 12, 2022, at 14:00 EDT. Please note that any bid submission after this date and time will be rejected.

#### Contact Information
If you have any queries or concerns about the bid, please contact:

* Vashti Ramnarine (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [vashti.ramnarine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:vashti.ramnarine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* More information can be found at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13930158?extsite=MTM5MzAxNThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13930158?extsite=MTM5MzAxNThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Procurement Category and UNSPSC Codes
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* UNSPSC Codes: 41103800, 41103900, 42000000, 42200000

#### Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Regions and Areas
* Delivery area: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
* Destination: Royal Military College Kingston

#### Contracting Entity Information
